segments.text: I observe the kitchen with the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes carefully, apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is on, water filling the basin fully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs the stool to reach the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grabs a cookie from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands nearby, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink shows a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back on both sides.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked bowls sit on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems a bit unsteady under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like they're sharing a quiet moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical family kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light from outside brightens the room nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR
